item.title: org-brain
item.description: org-brain org-brain is mind mapping software based on emacs. It provides the user with a way of scaffolding data within the terminal. org-brain projects in this organisation Infogetics A project for mapping out software, APIs, etc. for converting between information types. The focus is on maintaining expressive text as an interchange format. Sensorium A project for mapping out software, APIs, etc. for providing some kind of sense to an AI.

item.title: About
item.description: Infogetics is a GitHub organisation that maps software for transforming one type of information into another with the aim of developing an augmented intelligence sensorium. Here’s some art http://kinetecharts.org/ai-sensorium Shane Mulligan Website: Bodacious Blog GitHub: https://github.com/mullikine/ CV: https://mullikine.github.io/cv/ TakaheAI Website http://takaheai.github.io/
